title: How to Draw the Star of David

methods.name: Starting with an Upside Down Triangle

steps.headline: Draw an upside down triangle.
steps.description: It should be relatively close to the bottom of your paper.

steps.headline: Draw another triangle.
steps.description: It should be intersecting the first one, and should be right side up.

steps.headline: Draw a border.
steps.description: You can do this by drawing parallel lines next to all of the original lines. Make sure they're parallel.

steps.headline: Erase the inner lines.
steps.description: You can either make it complicated, or just simply erase all the inner lines. But make sure you erase your lines neatly.

steps.headline: Color it in.
steps.description: Since Israel's national colors are blue and white, these are recommended.

steps.headline: Draw a triangle normal, pointing up.
Draw another Triangle, this one pointing down.
steps.description: The two should overlap so it forms a six-pointed star.

steps.headline: Erase the lines inside the star.

text: Starting with an Upside Down Triangle Draw an upside down triangle. It should be relatively close to the bottom of your paper. Draw another triangle. It should be intersecting the first one, and should be right side up. Draw a border. You can do this by drawing parallel lines next to all of the original lines. Make sure they're parallel. Erase the inner lines. You can either make it complicated, or just simply erase all the inner lines. But make sure you erase your lines neatly. Color it in. Since Israel's national colors are blue and white, these are recommended. Starting with a Regular Triangle Draw a triangle normal, pointing up.  Draw another Triangle, this one pointing down. The two should overlap so it forms a six-pointed star. Erase the lines inside the star.  Color the star.
sentences: Starting with an Upside Down Triangle Draw an upside down triangle.
It should be relatively close to the bottom of your paper.
It should be intersecting the first one, and should be right side up.
You can do this by drawing parallel lines next to all of the original lines.
You can either make it complicated, or just simply erase all the inner lines.
But make sure you erase your lines neatly.
Since Israel's national colors are blue and white, these are recommended.
Starting with a Regular Triangle Draw a triangle normal, pointing up.
Draw another Triangle, this one pointing down.
The two should overlap so it forms a six-pointed star.
Erase the lines inside the star.
